mapper.sql: select table_id, table_name, table_comment, class_name, tpl_category, package_name, module_name, business_name, function_name, function_author,run_path,is_del,actions_type,is_cover, db_type, options, create_by, create_time, update_by,parent_id,parent_name,menu_name,module_codes,menu_icon,menu_target,menu_order, update_time, remark from gen_table
mapper.select: SELECT t.table_id, t.table_name, t.table_comment, t.class_name, t.tpl_category, t.package_name, t.module_name, t.business_name, t.function_name, t.function_author, t.options, t.remark, t.db_type,t.run_path,t.is_del,t.actions_type,t.is_cover,t.parent_id,t.parent_name,t.menu_name,t.module_codes,t.menu_icon,t.menu_target,t.menu_order, c.column_id, c.column_name, c.column_comment, c.column_type, c.java_type, c.java_field, c.is_pk,c.is_table_sort, c.is_increment, c.is_required, c.is_insert, c.is_edit, c.is_list, c.is_query, c.query_type, c.html_type, c.dict_type, c.sort, c.circle_type, c.edit_info FROM gen_table t LEFT JOIN gen_table_column c ON t.table_id = c.table_id where t.table_name = #{tableName}

SELECT t.table_id, t.table_name, t.table_comment, t.class_name, t.tpl_category, t.package_name, t.module_name, t.business_name, t.function_name, t.function_author, t.options, t.remark, t.db_type,t.run_path,t.is_del,t.actions_type,t.is_cover,t.parent_id,t.parent_name,t.menu_name,t.module_codes,t.menu_icon,t.menu_target,t.menu_order, c.column_id, c.column_name, c.column_comment, c.column_type, c.java_type, c.java_field, c.is_pk,c.is_table_sort, c.is_increment, c.is_required, c.is_insert, c.is_edit, c.is_list, c.is_query, c.query_type, c.html_type, c.dict_type, c.sort, c.circle_type, c.edit_info FROM gen_table t LEFT JOIN gen_table_column c ON t.table_id = c.table_id where t.table_id = #{tableId}

select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) AND table_name NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' AND table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' AND table_name NOT IN (select table_name from gen_table)
select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())
select table_name from gen_table where db_type = 1;

select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database()) AND table_name NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' AND table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' AND table_name NOT IN (select table_name from gen_table)
AND table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
AND table_comment like concat('%', #{tableComment}, '%')

select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables where table_schema = (select database())
AND table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
AND table_comment like concat('%', #{tableComment}, '%')
AND table_name NOT IN
#{item}

select table_name, table_comment, create_time, update_time from information_schema.tables where table_name NOT LIKE 'qrtz_%' and table_name NOT LIKE 'gen_%' and table_schema = (select database()) and table_name in
#{name}
mapper.delete:
delete from gen_table where table_id in
#{tableId}
